allAges.name: Oyhut Bay Grill
allAges.desc: located in Oyhut Village, fine dining, great cocktails, indoor and outdoor seating, occasional live music.

allAges.name: Bennetts Fish Shack
allAges.desc: Best fish & chips, walk up ordering, fast service, full service bar/lounge with tv’s for watching sports.

allAges.name: Thian’s Thai Fusion
allAges.desc: Casual dining, open kitchen, fast service, friendly staff.

allAges.name: La Spiaggia Ristorante
allAges.desc: Traditional Italian cuisine made from scratch, intimate dining, full service bar.

allAges.name: OBR (ocean beach roasters)
allAges.desc: Café offering espresso, coffee and tea, beer and wine, pastries and good breakfast and lunch food options.

allAges.name: Galway Bay Irish Pub
allAges.desc: Restaurant and bar, fun atmosphere, irish and american food, irish whiskey and beer, live music and events, shuffleboard, darts, sports covered outdoor area, gift shop, cigar shop.

allAges.name: Dugan’s Pizza
allAges.desc: Has been in Ocean shores since 1982, good spot for families.

allAges.name: Brunch 101
allAges.desc: Discover the perfect brunch escape at Brunch 101! Carefully crafted dishes and freshly baked treats, including delicious vegan and gluten-free options.

allAges.name: Koko's Restaurant and Tequila Bar
allAges.desc: inspiration comes from both Mexican and Salvadoran cuisine

adults21.name: The Garage
adults21.desc: The Garage - Gastropub and local hangout, large tv's, great food, cocktails, beer, amazing staff and vibes, dog friendly outdoor area, open late.

adults21.name: Corks & Taps
adults21.desc: Great small plate options and fun beer and wine selections.

adults21.name: Ocean Pours Taproom
adults21.desc: Cozy small indoor area with a lot of beer, wine and cider options, and large outdoor dog friendly sitting area.

adults21.name: Porthole Pub
adults21.desc: Fun for nightlife, Karaoke and live music, local hangout, good drink and food options, good for sports, great staff, open late.

adults21.name: 8th Street Ale House
adults21.desc: Good food and drinks, Good for watching sports.

adults21.name: The Cave Bar
adults21.desc: Great prices on drinks and snacks, good for watching sports, lots of daily events, neighborhood bar, great staff.

adults21.name: The Tap Room
adults21.desc: local intimate bar, good for watching sports, some food options, open late.

adults21.name: Steam Donkey Brewing
adults21.desc: Local brewery, food truck outside, lots of beer, and cider options.

adults21.name: Rising Tide Tavern
adults21.desc: Rising Tide Tavern - Good cocktails with a variety of good food options.

shops.name: Sharky’s Gift Shop
shops.desc: Fun beach souvenir shop packed with shells, toys, coastal decor, and quirky gifts — an easy stop for families and kids.

shops.name: North Coast Surf Inc
shops.desc: Local surf shop offering boards, rentals, beach gear, and apparel — a go-to spot for surfing, kites, and ocean-ready equipment.

shops.name: Breezy Beach Clothing
shops.desc: Relaxed coastal boutique featuring casual beachwear, hoodies, and comfortable pieces perfect for cool ocean mornings.

shops.name: Too Cool Sportswear
shops.desc: Colorful beach apparel and souvenir shop known for fun designs, sweatshirts, and Ocean Shores themed clothing.

shops.name: Ocean Shores Soapworks
shops.desc: Handcrafted soaps, bath products, and locally made gifts with coastal scents — great for unique souvenirs or self-care treats.

shops.name: The Boardwalk Shops
shops.desc: Cluster of small boardwalk-style shops offering souvenirs, treats, beach toys, and casual browsing close to main beach access.

shops.name: Cloud Nine Ocean Shores
shops.desc: Playful boutique featuring gifts, beach-themed items, and fun novelty finds — a relaxed stop while exploring the main strip.

shops.name: Burlap and Lace Vintage Market
shops.desc: Vintage and farmhouse-style market with antiques, handmade decor, and rotating vendor finds — great for treasure hunting.

shops.name: Anchor Ave Thrift Store
shops.desc: Community thrift shop with affordable clothing, home goods, and unexpected gems — ideal for rainy-day browsing.

shops.name: The Acorn Tree Thrift Store
shops.desc: Small nonprofit thrift store supporting local causes with clothing, books, and household finds at budget-friendly prices.

shops.name: Ocean City Marketplace
shops.desc: Local marketplace featuring collectibles, antiques, crafts, and rotating vendor booths — a fun off-the-beaten-path stop.

shops.name: North Beach PAWS
shops.desc: Animal shelter and adoption center with a small thrift-style shop — a meaningful stop for pet lovers and community support.

activities.name: Ocean Shores Beach Access
activities.desc: Wide, drive-on beach with plenty of space for walking, sandcastles, kite flying, and storm watching.

activities.name: Local Forest Walks group 1
activities.desc: Short drives from Hoquiam lead to easy forest trails, great for stretching your legs between beach days.

activities.name: Local Forest Walks group 2
activities.desc: Short drives from Hoquiam lead to easy forest trails, great for stretching your legs between beach days.

activities.name: Pacific Beach Overlook
activities.desc: Quick stop with big views of the coastline perfect for photos or a quiet moment between plans.

activities.name: Damon Point State Park
activities.desc: Quiet jetty walk with dunes, driftwood, wildlife viewing, and wide open ocean views. Great for sunset walks and birdwatching year-round.

activities.name: Ocean Shores North Jetty
activities.desc: Rocky jetty popular for storm watching, fishing, and big surf views. Best during dramatic weather but peaceful on calm days too.

activities.name: Coastal Interpretive Center
activities.desc: Small local museum with maritime history, shipwreck stories, and rotating exhibits. Easy rainy-day stop for families.

activities.name: Oyhut Wildlife Recreation Area
activities.desc: Protected shoreline and wetlands with walking paths, wildlife sightings, and fewer crowds than main beach access.

activities.name: Duck Lake Park
activities.desc: Kayaking, fishing docks, playground, and picnic space. Nice break from the wind when the ocean feels rough.

activities.name: Seabrook Beach Walk
activities.desc: Bluff access leading to long walkable beach stretches. Great for morning coffee walks and evening sunsets.

activities.name: Seabrook Forest Trails
activities.desc: Easy wooded trails connecting neighborhoods, playgrounds, and viewpoints. Calm alternative to windy beach days.

activities.name: Pacific Beach State Park
activities.desc: Classic coastal park with beach access, camping views, and plenty of space for picnics and tidepool exploring.

activities.name: Mocrocks Beach
activities.desc: Seasonal clamming and tidepool exploration with starfish, anemones, and shells. Best during low tide windows.

activities.name: Grays Harbor Historical Seaport
activities.desc: Tall ship dock, maritime exhibits, and occasional ship tours. Fun stop for kids and history lovers.

activities.name: Kurt Cobain Memorial Park
activities.desc: Small riverside memorial and photo stop honoring Aberdeen’s most famous musician. Quick and meaningful visit.

activities.name: Wishkah River Walk
activities.desc: Peaceful waterfront walkway through downtown Aberdeen. Good for stretching your legs between drives.

activities.name: Hoquiam Castle
activities.desc: Historic mansion offering tours and seasonal events. Even from outside, it's a unique coastal landmark.

activities.name: Friends Landing Park
activities.desc: Riverside park with walking trails, wildlife viewing, and boat launch access. Quiet and relaxing year-round.

activities.name: Lake Quinault Rainforest Loop
activities.desc: Scenic rainforest drive with waterfalls, giant trees, and lakeside stops. Beautiful in every season, especially fall.

activities.name: Westport Marina & Observation Tower
activities.desc: Fishing boats, seafood stops, and a viewing tower with panoramic harbor views. Great afternoon outing.

activities.name: Grays Harbor Lighthouse
activities.desc: Historic lighthouse with occasional climb access and strong coastal photo opportunities.
